title: ‘Yellowstone’ Season 4, Episode 3 Recap
description:
Chris Ryan and Ryen Russillo team up once again to discuss this week’s episode of ‘Yellowstone.’ They break down a must-see dive bar shoot-out, parenting, and more. Plus, they discuss how Taylor Sheridan manages to be the busiest writer in TV. 
Host: Chris Ryan and Ryen Russillo 
Associate Producer: Lani Renaldo
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
